_a-0000ed24-7935-8000-9d2d-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_WFL_QE_GetCaseTypeTaskWorkflowPathMapping
_a-0000ed24-7935-8000-9d2d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryEntity(
  entity: cons!CMGT_WFL_ENT_CASE_TYPE_TASK_WORKFLOW_PATH_MAPPING,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CMGT_WFL}CMGT_WFL_CFG_CaseTypeTaskWorkflowPathMapping',
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "caseTypeTaskWorkflowPathId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!caseTypeTaskWorkflowPathId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!isActive
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  logicalExpression: ri!additionalLogicalExpression,
  returnType: a!defaultValue(
    ri!returnType,
    cons!CMGT_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
  ),
  pagingInfo: if(
    ri!returnType <> cons!CMGT_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
    null,
    a!defaultValue(
      ri!pagingInfo,
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1, cons!CMGT_INT_BATCH_SIZE_MEDIUM)
    )
  ),
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort,
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh
)

_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_zINTERNAL_ReturnCdtFields_PrimitiveTypeCheckHandler
CMGT_UTIL_DisplayValue
_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
displayvalue(
  
  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_ReturnCdtFields

af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.name: CMGT_UTIL_Filter
af326a29-a1c8-4399-a28d-996f85819d9e.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    apply(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_CreateFieldValuePair(
        field: _,
        value: ri!value,
        allFields: a!flatten(ri!field)
      ),
      a!flatten(ri!field)
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!CMGT_UTIL_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

CMGT_UTIL_ChooseWhereContainsHelper
_a-0000ed12-0330-8000-9d27-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer',
  rule!CMGT_UTIL_ReplaceNull(
    nullableValue: rule!CMGT_UTIL_WhereContains(values: ri!value, array: ri!inArray) + 1,
    replacementValue: 1
  )
)

)
